name: Jesus Blanco
text: I worked directly with Nick on the Frontend team for five years, and it has been one of the most enriching experiences of my professional career. He always has proposals and solutions tailored to the challenges at hand. His deep knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals and creativity combine to produce really high-quality products, both visually and in code.

name: Gabriela Parra
text: Working with Nick is comforting â€” he creates an environment that flows as naturally as water. Even in the stormiest moments, he finds a way to lift you up. More than that, he makes you feel deeply, and in calmer times, helps you grow as a person.

name: David Vaisberg
text: I had the pleasure of working closely with Nick as our Lead Product Designer. He is a tremendous professional whose impact is felt every day. Nick is a great designer, but more importantly an exceptional thinker. [...].Working with Nick is a rare and enriching experience, and anyone who has the opportunity to collaborate with him will benefit from his expertise, leadership, and passion for excellence.

name: Federico Benavidez
text: I worked with Nick in a tech team where he was leading frontend-related projects and efforts. I've had foundational knowledge on development back then, yet I insisted on getting more hands-on experience on some topics. That's when I saw Nicks potential: he's smart, calm, and takes good decisions in terms of system design and well-structured patterns; knows how to transfer knowledge, tackle issues and collaborate with other engineers to generate value (and real results!).

name: Adrian Villasmil
text: Working with Nick is an enriching experience that fosters mutual growth and a deeper understanding of the project. His approach is centered on truly listening to and understanding the client, allowing him to communicate the best ideas clearly and effectively while achieving goals on time.
